page.title: 10SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: { MRS METHVEN REMEMBERS. _______________________ Mrs Methven has lived in Braco all her life (68 years).There were no electric lights at that time.Mrs Methven has seen lots of changes in Braco she does not like them all.There were 5 shops then a Drapers,Tailors,Bakers,Two Sweet Shops and a Post-office.Mrs Methven's best friend was Cathy Titterington known now as Mrs Smith. They are still in touch.Mrs Methven met her husband at school but got friedly at a wedding.Her teachers names were Miss Douglas,Miss Ronald and Mr Smith.Mrs Methven hasn't lived in the same house in Braco.Her most frighting experience was a really great storm in 1930.She takes part in many village activites despite being crippled with arthritis.She is very friendly.
